title: WCAS SLAVIC 208-2-1 Intermediate Polish: Language and Culture

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: In Winter Quarter of Second Year Polish the students expand their speaking, reading and writing skills by building on grammar and vocabulary learned during the Fall quarter. As a complement to the linguistic side of the course, the students will gain a greater familiarity with Polish history and culture through varied means including readings of literary works, articles from contemporary Polish newspapers and movies.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
Textbook (Required) Please bring both to each class session:
Agnieszka Burkat & Agnieszka Jasi?ska, Hurra po polsku 2 (textbook, workbook and 2 CDs), Kraków: Prolog - Szko?a J?zyków Obcych, 2010 (please bring both the workbook and textbook to each class meeting)

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value:
Recommended:
Józef Pyzik, Przygoda z gramatyk?, Kraków: Universitas, 2006.
Polish grammar in English (for example Polish Grammar in a Nutshell), Polish-English dictionary (electronic or paper)

subject: SLAVIC
